Santa_Monica.Amrita School of Engineering: Amrita School of Engineering (ASE) is an engineering institution, part of Amrita University located in Ettimadai, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. It is located on a 420 acres (1.7 km2) campus at the foot hills of the Western Ghats. ASE provides UG programmes in seven branches and PG programmes including MCA, and M.Tech in eight core areas.
